# About us

EUROCONTROL Business Case team is a dedicated team of experts supporting stakeholders to choose among different solutions and alternatives making use of the best available data. For more than 15 years, EUROCONTROL has been providing ATM decision makers with a wide range of  information enabling them to take rational long-term investment decisions.
